text: (light instrumental music)
- [Narrator] Before, there weren't a ton

of options around here because
there wasn't that growth
and it's allowing people to stay, you know
close to their family, close to home
(light instrumental music continues)

- [Voiceover] Less city life,
more down to earth people
that are at a slower pace

like you can't drive down the
road without seeing somebody
and they wave to you on their way by.

- [Teacher] My philosophy
is, let's throw you

in the deep end and let's
see what you're capable of.

- [Student] I wanna do
something in engineering.
I mean, if I could get paid doing robotics
it would be kind of a dream.
- My bakery, it's chocolate bakery

it's being three years
baking inside my house.
- It makes me excited to see

'cause I can tell it's what
you were supposed to do.

- [Worker] We've grown
with AWS, they demand a lot
but they also put back
in a lot to not only the local contractors

that works for 'em, but
the community as well.
